name: Feast Manor
description:
Feast Manor is a point and click visual novel. Explore at your own pace and interact with voluptuous girls, each with their own personality and body type. Find items and complete puzzles as you uncover the secrets to the manor!

FEATURES

  • A cute girl who gains weight.
  • 4 voluptuous girls who need help.
  • Beautifully hand-drawn 4K visuals.
  • A well crafted story.
  • Puzzles to solve and items to find.
  • A gallery to admire your accomplishments.
  • Secrets and a hidden ending.
  • Did I mention a cute girl who gains weight?
